org.deeplearning4j.optimize.solvers.accumulation.MessageHandler

    • Uses of MessageHandler in org.deeplearning4j.optimize.solvers.accumulation

      Classes in org.deeplearning4j.optimize.solvers.accumulation that implement MessageHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EncodingHandler
      This MessageHandler implementation is suited for debugging mostly, but still can be used in production environment if you really want that.
      class  LocalHandler
      MessageHandler implementation suited for ParallelWrapper running on single box PLEASE NOTE: This handler does NOT provide any network connectivity.
      Fields in org.deeplearning4j.optimize.solvers.accumulation declared as MessageHandler

      protected MessageHandler BasicGradientsAccumulator.handler

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EncodedGradientsAccumulator.Builder EncodedGradientsAccumulator.Builder.messageHandler(MessageHandler handler)
      This method allows to specify MessageHandler instance Default value: EncodingHandler

      Creates new GradientsAccumulator with custom starting threshold

    • Uses of MessageHandler in org.deeplearning4j.spark.parameterserver.networking

      Classes in org.deeplearning4j.spark.parameterserver.networking that implement MessageHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WiredEncodingHandler
      This MessageHandler implementation does the same as EncodingHandler, plus additionally: sends encoded messages over the wire + receives encoded messages from outer parties
